title: Android TV 11 comes to third-gen Amazon Fire TV w/ unofficial LineageOS 18.1 builds
content:
Thanks to an unofficial build of LineageOS 18.1, the latest Android TV 11 builds can be sideloaded onto third-generation Amazon Fire TV hardware.

moreâ€¦

The post Android TV 11 comes to third-gen Amazon Fire TV w/ unofficial LineageOS 18.1 builds appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: With an unofficial build of LineageOS 18.1 the latest Android TV 11 builds can be sideloaded onto third-generation Amazon Fire TV hardware.
